Protocol Utilities¶

The tempodb.protocol.protocol module has utilities for working with the TempoDB REST protocol.

tempodb.protocol.protocol.make_series_key(key)[source]¶

Utility function for making a series key POST body, used mainly for the series creation API endpoint.

Parameters:key (string) – the series key
Return type:string
